name: SigningHub
overview:
SigningHub is online document signing and digital signature creation service. The company behind this is Ascertia who has a vast experience of digital signature and digital signature verification solutions.

The unique thing about SigningHub is that it allows users to apply visible digital signature which are unique to each individual. Plus it also ensures that these digital signatures are not basic ones rather create advanced digital signature which contains both the signer revocation status and the cryptographic time when it was created. The cryptographic time is added using Timestamps.

User can also use their Windows Keystore or Smart Cards to digital sign their documents.

The top 10 features includes:

1) Advanced Digital Signature creation and verification 2) Support of Smart Cards and Windows Keystore 3) Works for PDF and MS Office documents 4) Group and Delegate signing 5) API integration with existing solutions 6) Built in SharePoint integration 7) Digital Signatures are compatible with PDF standards 8) Works with all the notable browsers i.e. FF, Chrome, IE, Safari 9) Available 24x7x365 10) Can be deployed locally in house by companies
